sukhwinder.chat
Class Chatter

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--sukhwinder.chat.Chatter
public class Chatter
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents a chatter in the chat room. For each Chatter object a name, age and login time is required.

Author:
Sukhwinder Singh

Constructor Detail

Chatter

public Chatter(java.lang.String name,
               java.lang.String sex,
               long loginTime)
Used to create a new Chatter object. It acccepts a name age and time of his login.

Parameters:
name - name of the chatter
loginTime - time when user logged in. Got using Date.getTime(). Works as a timestamp.

setEnteredInRoomAt

public void setEnteredInRoomAt(long enteredAt)
sets time in milliseconds when a user has entered into a particular room. It is used to display only messages sent after a person has entered into a room.

getEnteredInRoomAt

public long getEnteredInRoomAt()
returns time in milliseconds when a user has entered into a particular room. It is used to display only messages sent after a person has entered into a room.

Returns:
long milliseconds got using Date.getTime()
